Name: VPCGatewayAttachment
Documentation: Attaches a gateway to a VPC.

Parameters.Name: InternetGatewayId
Parameters.Documentation: The ID of the Internet gateway.

Parameters.Name: VpcId
Parameters.Documentation: The ID of the VPC to associate with this gateway.

Parameters.Name: VpnGatewayId
Parameters.Documentation: The ID of the virtual private network (VPN) gateway to attach to the VPC.
